name: FINE ART PRINT: STATE OF DRAG **LIMITED TO 100**
description:
*AVAILABLE EXCLUSIVELY AT SHARON NEEDLES OFFICIAL STORE*

A Digital Fine Art Print Collection by Santiago Felipe of Sharon Needles

Limited & Numbered to 100

For the first time,  Santiago releases a limited number of prints of
Sharon Needles from his collection. Three different portraits, in a limited run of only 100 each. The prints are 16 x 14 inches with a 1 inch border and are printed on “Hahnemühle FineArt/William Turner Matte Paper”.

The prints are hand signed and numbered, and accompanied with a certificate of authenticity.  

Prints available are “I Wish I Were Amanda Lepore”, “Voodoo”, & “State of Drag”

"State of Drag"
This photograph of Sharon Needles led the piece for NEXT Magazine’s 3rd annual The State of Drag 2012 issue. Recently having won the title of RuPaul’s Drag Race Superstar, Santiago Felipe felt it was appropriate for Sharon to be a part of this issue, which helped shine a spot on some of the new girls in New York City’s drag scene. The shoot was styled by
Geoffrey Mac. Sharon wears harnesses by Zana Bayne and jewelry by House of Cach. Location & hair by hairdresser and model Seventy Jane! The image was published on November 16th of 2012 in NEXT Magazine. For the first time, prints are being made available to fans... as a 16 x 14 inch fine art print, in a limited edition of 100. 

All prints are on William Turner Paper – a white, 100% cotton paper – guarantees archival standards. The mould-made watercolor paper features a distinct textured surface. With its premium matt inkjet coating William Turner meets the highest industry standards regarding density, color gamut, color graduation and image sharpness while preserving the special touch and feel of genuine art paper. Compatible with pigmented and dye inkjet systems.

About the Photographer Santiago Felipe, born and raised in Miami, Florida - a self-taught visual artist, photographer and now, director, now works out of Brooklyn, NY. Santiago has had the pleasure of working along the side of many talents such as Icona Pop, Natalia Kills, SSION, Neon Hitch, & Kate Nash. Has had his work published in numerous publications such as Village Voice, Frieze, The Wall Street Journal & Delta-Sky. He recently directed & produced Sharon Needles' second music video off PG-13, “Call Me on The Ouija Board”.

name: FINE ART PRINT: VOODOO  **LIMITED TO 100**
description:
*AVAILABLE EXCLUSIVELY AT SHARON NEEDLES OFFICIAL STORE*

A Digital Fine Art Print Collection by Santiago Felipe of Sharon Needles

Limited & Numbered to 100

For the first time,  Santiago releases a limited number of prints of
Sharon Needles from his collection. Three different portraits, in a limited run of only 100 each. The prints are 16 x 14 inches with a 1 inch border and are printed on “Hahnemühle FineArt/William Turner Matte Paper”.

The prints are hand signed and numbered, and accompanied with a certificate of authenticity.  

Prints available are “I Wish I Were Amanda Lepore”, “Voodoo”, & “State of Drag”

VOODOO:
This image comes from a shoot which took place on April 29th 2012, the day before the crowning of RuPaul’s DragRace Season 4 and Sharon Needles being announced the winner! This project was the shoot that started it all and turned out to be the bonding relationship of the photographer & talent. It also was the start of many projects between designer Geoffrey Mac & Sharon Needles. Geoffrey Mac designed the garments worn by Sharon as well as did styling. including jewelry by Gabriel J. Shuldiner. Location by experiential designer Adam Aleksander.
Phi Phi O’hara voodoo doll constructed by Michael Ventolo. This image made the cover of NEXT Magazine on May 4th of 2012. If you're lucky, you can still find copies on Ebay! Now, for the first time, prints are being made available to fans... as a 16 x 14 inch fine art print, in a limited edition of 100. 

All prints are on William Turner Paper – a white, 100% cotton paper – guarantees archival standards. The mould-made watercolor paper features a distinct textured surface. With its premium matt inkjet coating William Turner meets the highest industry standards regarding density, color gamut, color graduation and image sharpness while preserving the special touch and feel of genuine art paper. Compatible with pigmented and dye inkjet systems.

About the Photographer Santiago Felipe, born and raised in Miami, Florida - a self-taught visual artist, photographer and now, director, now works out of Brooklyn, NY. Santiago has had the pleasure of working along the side of many talents such as Icona Pop, Natalia Kills, SSION, Neon Hitch, & Kate Nash. Has had his work published in numerous publications such as Village Voice, Frieze, The Wall Street Journal & Delta-Sky. He recently directed & produced Sharon Needles' second music video off PG-13, “Call Me on The Ouija Board”.

name: FINE ART PRINT: I WISH I WERE AMANDA LEPORE **LIMITED TO 100**
description:
*AVAILABLE EXCLUSIVELY AT SHARON NEEDLES OFFICIAL STORE*

A Digital Fine Art Print Collection by Santiago Felipe of Sharon Needles

Limited & Numbered to 100

For the first time,  Santiago releases a limited number of prints of
Sharon Needles from his collection. Three different portraits, in a limited run of only 100 each. The prints are 16 x 14 inches with a 1 inch border and are printed on “Hahnemühle FineArt/William Turner Matte Paper”.

The prints are hand signed and numbered, and accompanied with a certificate of authenticity.  

Prints available are “I Wish I Were Amanda Lepore”, “Voodoo”, & “State of Drag”

“I Wish I Were Amanda Lepore"
Previously unreleased image! The print discreetly made a debut at the Broome Street Gallery, NY back in April 2013, featured in a group exhibition titled DOWNTOWN curated by Jason LeBlond. The exhibition featured iconic NYC artists of the past forty years, who have worked, lived and inspired the city’s creative epicenter. “I Wish I Were Amanda Lepore” was shown alongside legendary portraits of  Leigh Bowery and silkcreens by Andy Warhol.  There had only been a 40x30 Artist Proof of “I Wish I Were Amanda Lepore” printed. Guests at the gallery didn’t even realize it was Sharon Needles in the photograph, since Sharon & Amanda looked so identical! The 40x30 print immediately sold to a collector. Now, for the first time, the photo is being made available to fans... as a 16 x 14 inch fine art print, in a limited edition of 100. This shoot was the first time
Sharon Needles & Amanda Lepore had been photographed together, as well as the first time Santiago Felipe worked with Amanda Lepore. The shoot was Styled by designer Geoffrey Mac and set design by George Oh. Amanda Lepore voodoo doll constructed by Michael Ventolo. 

All prints are on William Turner Paper – a white, 100% cotton paper – guarantees archival standards. The mould-made watercolor paper features a distinct textured surface. With its premium matt inkjet coating William Turner meets the highest industry standards regarding density, color gamut, color graduation and image sharpness while preserving the special touch and feel of genuine art paper. Compatible with pigmented and dye inkjet systems.

About the Photographer Santiago Felipe, born and raised in Miami, Florida - a self-taught visual artist, photographer and now, director, now works out of Brooklyn, NY. Santiago has had the pleasure of working along the side of many talents such as Icona Pop, Natalia Kills, SSION, Neon Hitch, & Kate Nash. Has had his work published in numerous publications such as Village Voice, Frieze, The Wall Street Journal & Delta-Sky. He recently directed & produced Sharon Needles' second music video off PG-13, “Call Me on The Ouija Board”.

name: SHARON NEEDLES BLACK TANK TOP
description:
Add this beautiful, spooky, and stupid tank top to your wardrobe. 

Features a stunning image of Sharon Needles on the front with iridescent crystallina lips, and a Sharon Needles signature print on the back.

unisex
100% fine ring-spun jersey cotton
combed for softness and comfort
double-stitched bottom hem
3/8" (1cm) binding finish
American Apparel brand
made in downtown Los Angeles

available in sizes XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
*2XL and 3XL styles are District brand

Photo by: Austin Young

name: SHARON NEEDLES MASK - "SPOOKY"
description:
SHARON NEEDLES 2012 COLLECTION
LIMITED EDITION ITEM

Move over Party City! Sharon Needles has released her exclusive line of high quality costume masks that will last for generations of Sharon Needles fans.

These masks are WEARABLE ART created by hand at Nikki's Monster Shop. Masks are made using Slip Latex lifelike skin. With vents for ears, pupils, and nostrils - Sharon assumes her fans are alive and need these holes - her comfortable design fits most guests preparing to visit any coffin, graveyard, or undead festivity. The pupils are open and measure approximately 7mm in diameter. Mask comes with elastic strings that hold the mask firmly in place, as well as full black lashes on the top eye lids to make it come alive. Wig is not included. Mask size fits most. Remember these are all made by hand so colors may vary slightly.

Designed & Produced by: Nikki's Monster Shop
AVAILABLE EXCLUSIVELY AT SHARONNEEDLES.COM

name: Sharon Needles PG-13 PHYSICAL CD
description:
Sharon Needles PG-13

1. This Club Is A Haunted House (feat RuPaul)
2. Call Me On The Ouija Board
3. Dead Girls Never Say No
4. Drink Till I Die
5. I Wish I Were Amanda Lepore (feat Amanda Lepore)
6. Why Do You Think You Are Nuts?
7. Disco Ball
8. Dressed To Kill
9. Let's All Die
10. Kai Kai (feat Ana Matronic and Alaska Thunderfuck)
11. Everyday Is Halloween
12. Hail Satan! (feat Jayne County)

Produced and Mixed by Tomas Costanza
Recorded by Killingsworth Recording Company in Studio City CA
Engineered by Suzy Shinn, David Baker, Chad Rollinson
Mastered by Drew Lavyne
Photographed by Austin Young
Managed by Producer Entertainment Group LLC

name: SHARON NEEDLES TRICK OR TREAT BAG
description:
Eco-friendly & reinforced to carry the heaviest load of candy and needle-ridden fruit.

Fantastic for smuggling contraband across the borders of different trick or treat neighborhoods.

It also serves as a trashy bag to put your terrible Sharon Needles crap in after Halloween.

Guaranteed to last 666 haunted house stops, or we'll ouija you a new one! 

Recyclable.

*Cat not included.

options.name: SHARON NEEDLES TRICK OR TREAT BAG
